TopicTitle: Saved Rockets (maybe sub-assemblies too) - allow for folders of designs.

Articles.Content:
I didn't see any suggestions covering this in my thorough, 5-minute intensive review of the suggestion forms...

Maybe, and I don't know here, but maybe it would be helpful to be able to create folders or directories for rocket designs? Just a thought I had while browsing through my list.

I suppose it could create more clutter, but I was thinking it would be nice to have that as I was paging through my 20 or so designs - which are all variants of several core designs which intern are mission-type specific.

I don't know, like I say, it could make things easier for me in when it comes to organizing my sprawling list of forgotten vehicles - or it could provide me with the means to turn a cluttered list into a function-orientated, toolbox of terror science... or a truly spectacular mess.

Like I say, I don't know for sure - but I think it might make my life (and possibly the lives of others) easier when it comes to organizing my designs.

Thanks for your time,

CannonFodder_833

(Steve)
